item.title: CVE-2021-39339|2024-08-04T02:06:42.215Z -- telefication -- telefication
item.description: The Telefication WordPress plugin is vulnerable to Open Proxy and Server-Side Request Forgery via the ~/bypass.php file due to a user-supplied URL request value that gets called by a curl requests. This affects versions up to, and including, 1.8.0.
